Welcome to the Heart Disease Prediction documentation!¶

This project aims to predict the likelihood of heart disease based on several medical features. It is developed using Flask for the backend, machine learning models for prediction, and includes thorough testing to ensure its correctness.

Team Members:¶

  • Reeju: Backend development (Flask app, views).

  • Gautam: Machine learning models for heart disease prediction.

  • Ravan (me): Writing tests and Sphinx documentation.
